definition: entry to another's property without right or permission, pass beyond (limits or boundaries)
details:
noun
- entry to another's property without right or permission
= synonyms: intrusion
- a wrongful interference with the possession of property, personal property as well as realty, or the action instituted to recover damages
= example: a wrongful interference with the possession of property, personal property as well as realty, or the action instituted to recover damages
verb
- pass beyond (limits or boundaries)
= synonyms: transgress, overstep
- commit a sin
= synonyms: sin, transgress
- break the law
- make excessive use of
= synonyms: take advantage
- enter unlawfully on someone's property
= example: enter unlawfully on someone's property
= synonyms: intrude
